Penal Code - PEN <-xmlns:stat>https://casetext.com/stat</-xmlns:stat><-id>rkHM0V8WX7fSkUMCVIZm7GryPzRELb7Xf</-id>TITLE OF THE ACT<-id>Sk9equ5GXmGrkolcu5zQ7fSkngqdqzQmM</-id>
( Heading enacted 1872. )<-id>rkgT5G7mzBygxTqMm7fHk-x6qM7Qf</-id>1.
This Act shall be known as The Penal Code of California, and is divided into four parts, as follows: I.—OF CRIMES AND PUNISHMENTS. II.—OF CRIMINAL PROCEDURE.III.—OF THE STATE PRISON AND COUNTY JAILS.IV.—OF PREVENTION OF CRIMES AND APPREHENSION OF CRIMINALS. (Amended by Stats. 1985, Ch. 367, Sec. 1.)(Amended by Stats. 1985, Ch. 367, Sec. 1.)<-id>rkzx69zXXGHymgp5f7XfS14gpqMQmz</-id>THE PENAL CODE OF CALIFORNIA<-id>Hyax9_cMQXzHyCg9_qfmXzS1kZ9u9zX7z</-id>PRELIMINARY PROVISIONS<-id>ByebqdqGQmzSJZbcucz7Qzr1zbquqM7XG</-id>PART 1. OF CRIMES AND PUNISHMENTS <-id>Hy7WqOqGQQMSk4b5O9fQQMByH-cucGmXz</-id>PART 2. OF CRIMINAL PROCEDURE <-id>HJUb9u5M7mMHyPZ5u5zQXzH1_Z5dcMmQG</-id>PART 3. OF IMPRISONMENT AND THE DEATH PENALTY <-id>BytW5_cfX7GHJ9W5dcG77MHJiWcOcMQ7z</-id>PART 4. PREVENTION OF CRIMES AND APPREHENSION OF CRIMINALS <-id>HJnWcO5GX7GHyTb5d9z77fHJCb9OcfmQM</-id>PART 5. PEACE OFFICERS' MEMORIAL <-id>rJJz5u5Mm7GrJgGcuqM77zrJWMcOcf7QG</-id>PART 6. CONTROL OF DEADLY WEAPONS <-id>HyzGcO5f77fBkmfcO5f7mfSkEM5O9MQmG</-id>
